fields.name: ExpressionPTT
fields.admin_html:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
  <head>
		<title>ExpressionPTT Admin</title>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodAdmin.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/ExpressionPTT/dev/admin/admin.js"></script>
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css"></link>
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/ExpressionPTT/dev/admin/admin.css"></link>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			{{ js }}
		</script>
		<style type="text/css">
			{{ css }}
		</style>
	</head>
	<body ng-include="'/static/experiments/ExpressionPTT/dev/admin/admin.html'"></body>
</html>

fields.html:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
	<head>
		<title>Wait</title>

		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/jquery/jquery.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/bootstrap/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/lib/angular/angular-1.2.16.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodCore.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodHelpers.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/js/redwoodSubject.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/ExpressionPTT/dev/subject/wait/wait.js"></script>
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}framework/css/bootstrap-3.1.1.min.css"></link>
		<link type="text/css" rel="stylesheet" href="{{ STATIC_URL }}experiments/ExpressionPTT/dev/subject/wait/wait.css"></link>
		<script type="text/javascript">
			{{ js }}
		</script>
		<style type="text/css">
			{{ css }}
		</style>
	</head>
{% verbatim %}
		<body ng-include="'/static/experiments/ExpressionPTT/dev/subject/wait/wait.html'"></body>
{% endverbatim %}
</html>
fields.name: Wait

fields.html:
<!DOCTYPE HTML>
<html ng-app="Redwood">
	<head>
